bear_hunt.notes: Max archers for highest Lethality. Infantry/Cavalry are formation filler only.

pvp_rally.notes: Balanced. Infantry meat shield absorbs damage, archers deal damage, cavalry flanks.

garrison.notes: No archers on walls (poor defensive stats). Heavy infantry with cavalry support.

open_field.notes: Same as rally. Cavalry can bypass infantry to hit archers directly.

hero_recommendations.bear_hunt_joiner_note: Only 4 joiner hero skills count. Send Chenko first if < 4 Chenkos in rally.
